textboxes.description: You sit with Bubba in the small camper, the air tense. Bubba has been quiet for days, but now, he’s finally spoken. 'I think I want to try and reconcile with Eris,' he says, his voice hesitant but determined. You feel a surge of anger—Eris, the goddess of discord, who once tore Bubba’s life apart. The idea of him going back to her doesn’t sit well with you.

choices.text: Tell him he’s making a mistake and he should stay away from Eris
Stay silent and let him figure it out on his own
Ask him why he wants to reconcile and listen to his reasons

textboxes.description: You snap at Bubba, telling him that going back to Eris is a terrible idea. 'She’ll only hurt you again, Bubba!' you say, your frustration boiling over. Bubba looks at you, his expression sad but resolute. 'I have to try,' he replies quietly.

choices.text: Demand that he choose between you and Eris
Apologize for snapping, but still tell him you don’t agree

textboxes.description: You stay silent, your mind racing. Bubba looks at you, waiting for a response, but you can’t bring yourself to speak. The tension hangs in the air as he waits for your approval or disapproval.

choices.text: Finally speak up and tell him how you really feel
Walk away, unable to handle the situation

textboxes.description: You take a deep breath and ask him, 'Why do you want to go back to her? After everything that happened?' Bubba’s face softens, and he looks away for a moment before answering. 'I think I need closure... and maybe I can change things this time.' His words are full of uncertainty, but there’s a spark of hope in his eyes.

choices.text: Tell him that closure doesn’t mean going back to Eris
Agree to help him find closure, but warn him to be careful

textboxes.description: You demand that Bubba choose between you and Eris. He looks conflicted but shakes his head. 'I can’t make that choice,' he says quietly. The weight of his words hangs heavy in the air, and you realize this might be the breaking point of your relationship.

choices.text: Walk away from Bubba, unable to stay in this situation
Give him the space to make his decision

textboxes.description: You apologize for snapping but tell Bubba that you still don’t agree with his decision. He nods, understanding that you’re just trying to protect him. But you can see the conflict in his eyes, torn between his past with Eris and the present with you.

choices.text: Give him time to think about his choices
Leave him and the camper to clear your mind

textboxes.description: You walk away from the camper, the cold air biting at your skin. The uncertainty of the situation gnaws at you. Will Bubba go back to Eris? Can your relationship survive this? Only time will tell.

choices.text: Sit down and think about everything that’s happened
Return to the camper and talk to Bubba again

textboxes.description: You agree to help Bubba find closure, but you warn him to be cautious. 'Don’t let her manipulate you again,' you say, your voice soft but firm. Bubba nods, grateful for your understanding, but you can see the doubt in his eyes.

choices.text: Follow him to meet Eris and ensure he stays safe
Stay back and let him handle this on his own

textboxes.description: You walk away, feeling a deep sense of loss. Bubba calls out to you, but you can’t bring yourself to turn around. This could be the end of your relationship, and it hurts more than you expected.

choices.text: Keep walking, leaving everything behind
Stop and talk to Bubba one last time

textboxes.description: You give Bubba the space he needs, but the silence between you both is deafening. He’s torn, and so are you. The future of your relationship seems uncertain, but you both know that a decision has to be made.

choices.text: Accept whatever decision he makes, even if it means losing him
Push him to make a choice now, before it’s too late

textboxes.description: You sit in silence, trying to sort through the feelings swirling in your mind. Bubba’s decision to reconcile with Eris has shaken you to your core, and you’re not sure how to move forward. The future feels uncertain, but you’re determined to face whatever comes next.

choices.text: Call Bubba and tell him you’re ready to talk
Decide to let go and move on

textboxes.description: You return to the camper and approach Bubba, who is sitting in silence, staring out the window. 'I don’t know what to do,' he says quietly. You sit down beside him, ready to have the difficult conversation.

choices.text: Tell him that you need clarity before you can move forward
Tell him that you love him and want to support him, no matter what

textboxes.description: You go with Bubba to meet Eris, determined to ensure he doesn’t fall into her manipulative grasp. The tension in the air is palpable as you wait for her to appear. When she does, her gaze is as cold and calculating as you remember.

choices.text: Confront Eris and demand she leave Bubba alone
Let Bubba speak with her alone and stay back

textboxes.description: You stay back as Bubba approaches Eris, your heart heavy with uncertainty. Will he come back the same, or will this encounter pull him further away from you? You watch them speak, the distance between you feeling as vast as ever.

choices.text: Leave, unable to bear watching anymore
Wait patiently, hoping he returns to you

textboxes.description: You confront Eris, your voice filled with anger and frustration. 'Leave him alone! Haven't you done enough?' Eris smirks, clearly amused by your outburst. Bubba looks between the two of you, torn but silent.

choices.text: Demand that Bubba choose here and now
Back down, realizing confrontation might make things worse

textboxes.description: You decide to let Bubba and Eris speak alone, stepping back but keeping a watchful eye. The conversation is inaudible from where you stand, but you can see Bubba’s shoulders slumped and Eris’s intense gaze fixed on him.

choices.text: Wait until Bubba finishes and offer him support
Leave quietly, giving them space

textboxes.description: Bubba walks back to you, looking drained yet resolute. 'I needed that,' he says, his voice hoarse. 'But I know now that I can’t go back to her.' You feel a wave of relief, grateful he’s come to his senses.

choices.text: Embrace him, grateful he chose to stay
Encourage him to take time for himself to heal

textboxes.description: The decision hangs heavy in the air. Whether he chooses you or Eris, something between you has changed. The uncertainty lingers as you walk away, unsure if things will ever be the same.
Bubba holds you close, his choice bringing a renewed bond between you both. The past with Eris fades as you both step forward together, ready to face whatever comes next, united and stronger.
You watch Bubba walk away to take time for himself, feeling a bittersweet sense of closure. Though things remain uncertain, there’s hope that he’ll return healed and ready for a fresh start.
